about_the_game:
You have been invited to a party at Steiner Mansion! But something is wrong. Soon after you arrive the host’s body is discovered at the bottom of the stairs. The house is on lockdown until the puzzle is solved and the criminal is revealed. Take part in a classic murder mystery that tests your skills of deduction.



At the start of the game, 4-12 players will spawn in as a guest, killer, or neutral player. Your job as a guest is to find clues that will lead you closer to who the killer is. Your job as the killer is to outnumber all the guests without being caught to win the game. To do this you will need to lie and deceive the other players and get them to believe you while picking them off one by one. Your job as a neutral is to fulfill your own goal while not dying from a killer or getting voted out during the meetings. Sometimes you will have a chance to spawn in as a special guest or special killer. These roles will have special abilities that will help their team win the game.

Play as a guest.

Guests will have a set of tasks you will need to do to unlock exits that will allow you to escape the map and win the game. Also, you will need to find the location of bodies, discover the murder weapon used to kill, search for clues that will lead you closer to who the killer is, and solve the mystery.

Become the killer.


Killers will be given fake tasks to do while deciding who their next victim might be. Grab a murder weapon while not being seen by guests. Choose a victim. Use stealth and go into kill mode. Kill guests and neutrals. Outnumber all the guests without being caught to win the game.

Find your own way to safety.

Neutrals will also be given fake tasks to do and also an objective that you will need to do to win the game.

Have a special role.


Become the doctor and help save guests or find hidden clues with the detective. Special roles have a chance to spawn in with an ability that will help their team win the game.
  • Detective
  • Doctor
  • Agent
  • Trapper
  • Serial Killer
  • Necromancer
  • Lone Survivor
  • and many more!

Whodunnit?

When you find a body or know who the killer is, call a meeting. During meetings the remaining players will discuss on who the possible killer could be. Cast your vote to vote out one of your fellow players, or play it safe and skip vote, the choice is yours.

Decide your own fate.

Guests and neutrals will have access to item chests around the map that will provide a way to fight back against killers.

FEATURES

  • Online multiplayer for 4-12 players
  • Private games
  • Character customizations
  • Friendly pet that follows you
  • Custom game modes
  • Multiple maps
  • Unique murder weapons
  • Voice and text chats

name: Guest Uncovered

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones

short_description: A murder mystery survival horror game where 4-12 players have been invited to a party as guests, but some guests are killers in disguise! Work together to escape and figure out who the killers are before you become their next victim!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
